"EX Training: Sylvan Wyverns":
"In order to measure the fighting
capabilities of ARKS under extreme
conditions, we've made a new program.
This is for ARKS who have confidence and
want to push their abilities to the next
level. Since the mission is extremely
dangerous, an [Extreme Pass] is
required to participate in this mission.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Time limit expires"

"You must pay 1 Extreme Pass
on the campship."
